title: Pharmacy - reference to Henry's home life

content.prompt: The reference to Henry’s home life in the second paragraph (“And . . . pharmacy”) serves mainly to

choices.label: contextualize his feelings about his time at work
characterize him as being estranged from his family
suggest an insincerity in his dealings with others
foreshadow an event later in the passage

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
